sentences.en: Driving the steep road to the mountaintop Inca ruins of Machu Picchu is potentially dangerous and hiking there is difficult.
sentences.cn: 沿着陡峭的道路驱车前往马丘比丘的印加遗址山顶是很危险的，在那里徒步旅行也很困难。

sentences.en: Thor Heyerdahl, the Norwegian ethnographer and adventurer, thought the statues had been created by pre-Inca peoples from Peru.
sentences.cn: 挪威民族志学者、冒险家托尔·海尔达尔认为，这些雕像是由来自秘鲁的前印加人创造的。

sentences.en: However, not all functional objects are exactly alike; that is why we recognize a Shang Dynasty vase as being different from an Inca vase.
sentences.cn: 然而，并不是所有的功能物品都完全相同；这就是我们认为商代花瓶不同于印加花瓶的原因。
